source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SEQ_00<tab>Slowfix wants you to eliminate the golems that prowl Idyllshire.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SEQ_00<tab>Slowfix wants you to eliminate the golems that prowl Idyllshire.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SEQ_01<tab>Golem sentinels left by the Sharlayans are hampering Slowfix's plans for expanding Idyllshire, and the goblin asks that you eliminate them. As a native of Sharlayan, Y'shtola may know an easy way to deal with the creatures.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SEQ_01<tab>Golem sentinels left by the Sharlayans are hampering Slowfix's plans for expanding Idyllshire, and the goblin asks that you eliminate them. As a native of Sharlayan, Y'shtola may know an easy way to deal with the creatures.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SEQ_02<tab>Y'shtola shares with you the coded command required to unmake the golems. With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to inform each golem that you want to play a game called “Noughts and Crosses.”
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SEQ_02<tab>Y'shtola shares with you the coded command required to unmake the golems. With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to inform each golem that you want to play a game called “Noughts and Crosses.”

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SEQ_03<tab>You have unmade all the golems in your assigned area. Return to Slowfix with the good tidings.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SEQ_03<tab>You have unmade all the golems in your assigned area. Return to Slowfix with the good tidings.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SEQ_04<tab>You report the completion of your task to Slowfix. The goblin is pleased to hear that the golems will no longer impede the expansion effort.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SEQ_04<tab>You report the completion of your task to Slowfix. The goblin is pleased to hear that the golems will no longer impede the expansion effort.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_TODO_01<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “Noughts and Crosses” to unmake golems.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_TODO_01<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “Noughts and Crosses” to unmake golems.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SLOWFIX_000_000<tab>Pshkohhh... So uplanders agree to help? Good! Here is what Slowfix wants uplanders to do.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SLOWFIX_000_000<tab>Pshkohhh... So uplanders agree to help? Good! Here is what Slowfix wants uplanders to do.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SLOWFIX_000_001<tab>Many golems prowl Idyllshire, get in the way of expansion plans. Slowfix wants uplanders to eliminate golems.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SLOWFIX_000_001<tab>Many golems prowl Idyllshire, get in the way of expansion plans. Slowfix wants uplanders to eliminate golems.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SLOWFIX_000_002<tab>Uplanders are Sharlayan, yes? Sharlayans should know best way to deal with creatures.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SLOWFIX_000_002<tab>Uplanders are Sharlayan, yes? Sharlayans should know best way to deal with creatures.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SLOWFIX_000_003<tab>Slowfix wants uplanders to eliminate golems. Uplanders are Sharlayan, yes? Sharlayans should know best way to deal with creatures.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SLOWFIX_000_003<tab>Slowfix wants uplanders to eliminate golems. Uplanders are Sharlayan, yes? Sharlayans should know best way to deal with creatures.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_ALPHINAUD_000_004<tab>From the goblins' perspective, such a well-appointed city is certainly an attractive proposition.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_ALPHINAUD_000_004<tab>From the goblins' perspective, such a well-appointed city is certainly an attractive proposition.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_YSHTOLA_000_005<tab>I suppose it's only to be expected that others would come and occupy Sharlayan. Nonetheless, it feels akin to having strangers take over your home in your absence.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_YSHTOLA_000_005<tab>I suppose it's only to be expected that others would come and occupy Sharlayan. Nonetheless, it feels akin to having strangers take over your home in your absence.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_ALPHINAUD_000_006<tab>Sentinel golems? I daresay Y'shtola will know how to deal with them.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_ALPHINAUD_000_006<tab>Sentinel golems? I daresay Y'shtola will know how to deal with them.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_YSHTOLA_000_010<tab>So we are to eliminate the golems. That should be a simple enough affair.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_YSHTOLA_000_010<tab>So we are to eliminate the golems. That should be a simple enough affair.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_YSHTOLA_000_011<tab>The automata were employed as sentinels, and by design can be unmade with a coded command. At the time of the exodus, it was “Noughts and Crosses,” and I see no reason why it should not still work.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_YSHTOLA_000_011<tab>The automata were employed as sentinels, and by design can be unmade with a coded command. At the time of the exodus, it was “Noughts and Crosses,” and I see no reason why it should not still work.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_YSHTOLA_000_012<tab>Let us divide the task between the three of us, the quicker to be finished with it.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_YSHTOLA_000_012<tab>Let us divide the task between the three of us, the quicker to be finished with it.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter the coded command “Noughts and Crosses” to unmake a golem.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter the coded command “Noughts and Crosses” to unmake a golem.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_YSHTOLA_000_014<tab>Use the coded command “Noughts and Crosses” to unmake the golems. If all goes well, we can accomplish the task without recourse to violence.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_YSHTOLA_000_014<tab>Use the coded command “Noughts and Crosses” to unmake the golems. If all goes well, we can accomplish the task without recourse to violence.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_ALPHINAUD_000_015<tab>I shall see to the golems beyond this point. The area yonder, I leave in your capable hands.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_ALPHINAUD_000_015<tab>I shall see to the golems beyond this point. The area yonder, I leave in your capable hands.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter the password “Noughts and Crosses” to unmake a golem.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter the password “Noughts and Crosses” to unmake a golem.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>With a shudder, the golem crumbles to pieces.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>With a shudder, the golem crumbles to pieces.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SLOWFIX_000_031<tab>Now we can resume work to expand settlement!
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_SLOWFIX_000_031<tab>Now we can resume work to expand settlement!

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_YSHTOLA_000_032<tab>I'm pleased to report that my golems obediently crumbled at my command.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_YSHTOLA_000_032<tab>I'm pleased to report that my golems obediently crumbled at my command.

source: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_ALPHINAUD_000_033<tab>Of all the luck, one of my golems was not receptive to the password, and tried to pummel me bloody. Thankfully, I managed to dance clear of its fists and strike it down.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA607_01656_ALPHINAUD_000_033<tab>Of all the luck, one of my golems was not receptive to the password, and tried to pummel me bloody. Thankfully, I managed to dance clear of its fists and strike it down.
